title: Open Syndrome Arbovirosis in General (Syndrome Definition)
organization: Ministry of Health and Social Welfare
authors: Dirección General de Vigilancia de la Salud
Ministerio de Salud Pública y Bienestar Social

references.title: Guía Nacional de Vigilancia y Control de Eventos de Notificación Obligatoria. Sistema Nacional de Vigilancia Epidemiológica. Paraguay, 2022

notes: Human-readable definition was automatically translated from Spanish to English.
human_readable_definition: Undifferentiated fever due to mosquito bite. Acute febrile syndrome with no apparent cause
